text:
Stelio De Carolis (14 November 1937 – 22 December 2017) was an Italian politician. He was born in Fumone, Italy. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1987 to 1994. He served on the Senate between 1996 and 2001.
De Carolis was struck by a car on 22 December 2017 while crossing the Viale Primo Maggio in Meldola and died at the age of 80.
